description: This spicy chana masala is made with fresh veggies simmered with chickpeas in a spicy curried tomato sauce.
name: Veggie Chana Masala
recipeIngredient: 1-14 oz. can or 1 3/4 cups cooked chickpeas

recipeInstructions.text: Coat a large skillet with oil and place over medium heat. Add onion and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes. Add garlic, ginger, seranno pepper, garam masala, turmeric, coriander and cumin. Sauté 1 minute more.

Add chickpeas, tomatoes (with their juices), broth, lemon juice, broccoli, cauliflower and carrot. Stir and bring to a simmer. Lower heat and allow to simmer until veggies reach desired tenderness, 10-15 minutes, adding a bit of water if the mixture becomes too dry.
Season with salt and pepper and sprinkle with fresh cilantro. Serve with naan or rice.
